item.title: Active Directory Home Lab
item.description: Active Directory Homelab Active Directory Administration: PowerShell: Automated provision, maintaining, and deprovisioning user accounts Setting up Remote Access Server (RAS) features to support NAT/PAT Implementation and maintenance of Windows DNS and DHCP services Configuration of Windows File Servers with implementation of quotas and NTFS permissions
